text: Shaolin may refer to: *Shaolin Monastery, a Buddhist monastery in Henan, China **Shaolin Kung Fu, the martial art associated with the monastery *Southern Shaolin Monastery, a Buddhist monastery in Fujian, China *Shaolin (movie), a martial arts film from 2011 *Shaolin (humorist) (1971-2016), Brazilian humorist *Shaolin Soccer, a movie starring Stephen Chow
title: Shaolin
